meanings.definition: A person who advocates or supports international cooperation and understanding.
meanings.sent1: As an internationalist, she believes in working together with people from all over the world.
meanings.sent2: The internationalist attended the conference to discuss global issues.
meanings.sent3: The internationalist joked that they could solve world problems over a cup of tea.
meanings.sent4: Her heart beat like an internationalist, always seeking unity among nations.
meanings.sent5: The image of the internationalist waving flags from different countries stuck in his mind.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of internationalism.
meanings.sent1: The internationalist organization promotes peace among nations.
meanings.sent2: She had an internationalist perspective, valuing diversity and collaboration.
meanings.sent3: The internationalist fashion show featured designs inspired by cultures worldwide.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like an internationalist map, connecting ideas from different countries.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the essence of an internationalist spirit, blending colors from various cultures.
